content: crochet marshmallow chick is a scrap yarn project these fluffy chicks can be used as easter decor they are quick to make and are perfect for little hands to hold and play you can make them in all sorts of colors finished size my finished size using bulky weight yarn and 5 5 mm crochet hook was 3 75 inches tall and 4 75 inches wide pink chick i have used other yarns for the same pattern and the completed project s sizes are as follows premier just chenille yarn and 5 5 mm hook - 4 5 inches tall and 5 5 inches wide blue chick bernat blanket yarn and 7 mm hook - 6 5 inches tall and 7 5 inches wide purple chick materials yarn bulky weight yarn i used bernat forever fleece finer in petunia you can substitute any yarn for this pattern and go down 1- 2 hook sizes from yarn recommendation hook 5 5 mm crochet hook stitch markers scissors yarn needle 8 mm safety eyes or black yarn and needle polyester fiberfill gauge not critical i hope you will crochet this along with me
